name: Upward Restriction
description:
Fling yourself to victory and obtain a position on the global leaderboards! It's a perfect day for cannon climbing.

This game was created for Collab Jam #1 in 48 hours by Rugbug Redfern.

If you want to follow my other games, subscribe to my youtube channel and join my discord server!

PLEASE NOTE THERE ARE 11 LEVELS, NOT 4. USE THE SCROLLBAR BELOW THE LEVEL SELECT TO SEE THE REST
